product_name: Novara Big Mouth Water Bottle - 21 fl. oz.
long_description: It truly never is a bad time to ride and our Novara Big Mouth water bottle is there to meet your hydrating needs while you're out enjoying that ride. Wide-mouth bottle design makes filling the bottle a breeze and accommodates ice cubes easily. BPA- and phthalate-free polyethylene is easy to squeeze to ensure a fast flow of your beverage; textured area enhances grip.
